articles.description: Diabetes, according to WHO is a chronic, metabolic disease characterised by elevated levels of blood glucose (or blood sugar) which, over time, leads to serious damage to the heart, blood vessels, eyes, kidneys, and nerves
articles.content: To keep their blood glucose levels in check, diabetics are often advised to restrict the consumption of some foods, increase the intake of some others, maintain a sleep routine, and also exercise reg… [+4363 chars]
